General.Name: Jiangsu Broadcasting Cable inf
General.Description: Jiangsu Broadcasting Cable Information Network Corporation Limited engages in the construction and operation of radio and television networks in China. The company is also involved in the development and operation of radio and television program transmission; and provision of data broadband and digital TV value-added services. The company was founded in 2008 and is based in Nanjing, China.
General.Address: Jiangsu Cable Triple Network Integration Hub Center, Nanjing, China, 210046

AddressData.Street: Jiangsu Cable Triple Network Integration Hub Center
